sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Dictionary Upgrade (Nov 2022 Release)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
        'query': 'name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^element=service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'reference_qual': 'active=true^EQ'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'nameINsn_spend_sdc_service_request,sn_spend_sdc_service_task^internal_type=collection^active=true',
        'attribute': {
            'attributes': 'email_client=true'
        }
    }
];

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-09 21:33:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a5c8e9544f1911108d667989ef72e056</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Dictionary Upgrade (Nov 2022 Release)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">d8a34403534f101077b6ddeeff7b12a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">d8a34403534f101077b6ddeeff7b12a5</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a5c8e9544f1911108d667989ef72e056</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-12 08:30:20</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
